Given User launch the browser # stepDefination.Steps.user_launch_the_browser() When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F" # stepDefination.Steps.user_opens_url(java.lang.String) And User enters email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin" # stepDefination.Steps.user_enters_email_as_and_password_as(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And Click on login # stepDefination.Steps.click_on_login() Then Page title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration" # stepDefination.Steps.page_title_should_be(java.lang.String) When User click on Customers menu # stepDefination.Steps.user_click_on_customers_menu() And Click on Customers menu item # stepDefination.Steps.click_on_customers_menu_item() And Click on Add New button # stepDefination.Steps.click_on_add_new_button() Then User can view Add a new customer page "Add a new customer / nopCommerce administration" # stepDefination.Steps.user_can_view_add_a_new_customer_page(java.lang.String) When User enters customer info # stepDefination.Steps.user_enters_customer_info() And Click on Save button # stepDefination.Steps.click_on_save_button() Then User can view confermation message "The new customer has been added successfully." # stepDefination.Steps.user_can_view_confermation_message(java.lang.String) And close browser # stepDefination.Steps.close_browser()
